arts.ttl: Clough gets the better of Ferguson as Mansfield ease past sorry Peterborough
arts.sum: The pressure is mounting on Posh boss Darren Ferguson as his side dropped to 17th.

arts.ttl: Preview: Peterborough United vs. Mansfield Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's League One clash between Peterborough United and Mansfield Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
